005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.List;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * Implements the XPath 3.1
023 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-not">fn:not</a>
024 * function.
025 */
026public final class FnNot {
027  private static final String NAME = "not";
028  @NonNull
029  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
030      .name(NAME)
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextIndependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("arg")
037          .type(IItem.class)
038          .zeroOrMore()
039          .build())
040      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
041      .returnOne()
042      .functionHandler(FnNot::execute)
043      .build();
044
045  private FnNot() {
046    // disable construction
047  }
048
049  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
050  @NonNull
051  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
052      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
053      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
054      IItem focus) {
055
056    ISequence<?> items = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.iterator().next());
057
058    IBooleanItem result = fnNot(items);
059    return ISequence.of(result);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Get the negated, effective boolean value of the provided item.
064   * <p>
065   * Based on the XPath 3.1
066   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-not">fn:not</a>
067   * function.
068   *
069   * @param item
070   *          the item to get the negated, effective boolean value for
071   * @return the negated boolean value
072   */
073  @NonNull
074  public static IBooleanItem fnNot(@NonNull IItem item) {
075    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(!FnBoolean.fnBooleanAsPrimitive(item));
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Get the negated, effective boolean value of the provided item.
080   * <p>
081   * Based on the XPath 3.1
082   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-not">fn:not</a>
083   * function.
084   *
085   * @param sequence
086   *          the sequence to get the negated, effective boolean value for
087   * @return the negated boolean value
088   */
089  @NonNull
090  public static IBooleanItem fnNot(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence) {
091    return FnBoolean.fnBoolean(sequence).negate();
092  }
093}
